user_query: I'm planning a retirement party for my colleague and want to ensure financial security for their future. Can you generate a credit report for my colleague to assess their financial stability? Additionally, fetch the daily low of Apple Inc.'s stock price to provide investment insights. Finally, recommend some thoughtful retirement gifts to commemorate their years of service.

TaskList.description: Generate a credit report for the colleague to assess their financial stability.
Fetch the daily low stock price of Apple Inc. to provide investment insights.
required_inputs: date for which to retrieve the price

TaskList.description: Recommend thoughtful retirement gifts to commemorate the colleague's years of service.
